author: karinj146
title: Wonderful Break
text:
We stayed at the Amba Hotel Charing Cross for two nights as a break in London for my partners 70th Birthday. It was so easy just walking from the station into the hotel and we were met with a warm welcome.
Everyone at the Hotel was friendly, charming and couldn't do enough for us. We had a very spacious comfortable room.
Breakfast in our room was on time, hot and very enjoyable and the evening meal was tasty.
We would definitely return to this hotel and highly recommend it.
